input.sentences: it was a cold morning at -17 degrees celsius .
we had to close the trails for safety .
the pine trees were white with snow .
we used the tractor to clear the trails .
it was going to take all day to clear the snow away .
output.sentences: This morning it was very cold, it was -17 degrees.
The trail was closed as a safety precaution
The trees where white, all covered in snow
There were tractors on the trail
The tractors were prepared for the snow day
